products.name: Cannabis
products.description: Cannabis refers to the dried leaves, flowers, stems, and seeds of the cannabis plant

products.name: cocane
products.description: an addictive stimulant drug made from the leaves of the coca plant

products.name: heroin
products.description: an opioid drug made from morphine, a natural substance taken from the seed pod of the various opium poppy plants

products.name: tobacco
products.description: Tobacco is a plant with leaves that contain nicotine, a highly addictive chemical.
